title.rendered: Karachi vs Multan, Pakistan T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Karachi: Matthew Wade (wk), James Vince, Haider Ali, Shoaib Malik, Imad Wasim (c), Ben Cutting, Irfan Khan, Aamer Yamin, Mohammad Umar, Imran Tahir, Akif Javed

Multan: Shan Masood, Mohammad Rizwan (c & wk), Rilee Rossouw, Kieron Pollard, David Miller, Khushdil Shah, Carlos Brathwaite, Usama Mir, Abbas Afridi, Mohammad Ilyas, Ihsanullah

Pitch Report

Venue: National Stadium, Karachi

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 191

2nd innings average score: 170

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Multan bowlers have failed to dismiss Imad Wasim in four of seven innings. Overall, he has scored 114 at 38 and picked six wickets in 10 innings.

Mohammad Rizwan (110*) and James Vince (75) were the captain and vice-captain of the Best11 respectively in the previous game between these teams. In fact, the unbeaten hundred shot up Rizwan’s average to 70 against Karachi.

An average of 30.7 versus Karachi makes Shan Masood a safe pick for this contest.

These conditions suit Rilee Rossouw’s brand of cricket. He has scored 218 runs at a staggering average of 72.6 in the current edition. 

Shoaib Malik has three 30-plus scores in the last six innings. In this period, he has scored 205 runs at 51. He also picked a wicket in the last head-to-head clash.

Ihsanullah has picked up 12 wickets in five matches in 2023.

Matthew Wade and Usama Mir were part of the Best11 in four of the last five matches.
